amendment.description: Amendment changes the date for holding a public hearing from 30 days after to 30 days before the Secretary proposes a closure of any local or county office of the Farm Service Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the date of holding a public meeting from 30 days after to 30 days before the Secretary proposes a closure of any local or county office of the Farm Service Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Ryan (OH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
